field_label: What is the subject's date of birth?
field_note: Record the date of birth using the DD-MM-YYYY format.

field_label: What is the sex of the subject?
field_note: Record the appropriate sex. Collect the sex or gender, as reported by the subject or caretaker. Select one.

field_label: What is the ethnicity of the subject?
select_choices_or_calculations: 1, Hispanic or Latino | 2, Not Hispanic or Latino
field_note: Study participants should self-report ethnicity, with ethnicity being asked about before race. Select one.

field_label: What is the race of the subject?
select_choices_or_calculations: 1, Black or African American | 2, American Indian or Alaska Native | 3, Asian | 4, Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander | 5, White
field_note: Study participants should self-report race, with race being asked about after ethnicity. Check all that apply.

field_label: What is the date of collection?
field_note: Record the date the demographics data were collected using the DD-MM-YYYY format.
Name of study personnel obtaining signature
